result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Granting Audiovisual Testimony - Trooper Hoy - Prelim 11/10/2022
for Audiovisual Testimony - Trooper Hoy - Prelim 11/10/2022 - Filed by ADA Benjamin Webster

CASES: 21CF257, 21CF443, 21CF550 & 22CF253. 8:37 AM. Defendant Bridget Marie Zimmer in court.  Attorney Renee M Taber in court for Bridget Marie Zimmer.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. CW-clerk.
22CF253-AIA-Atty Taber has underlying cases, SPD to be notified. Copy of CC provided to def & counsel. Reading waived. WSPH. 
Bonds cont. 8:56 am adj.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on November 10, 2022 at 10:30 am.

BOND COVERS CASES: 21CF257, 21CF443, 21CF550, 22CF253. Not to possess or consume alcohol. Not to possess or consume controlled substances without a prescription and only in amount/frequency as prescribed. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. No contact with CFG or LMB. Not to operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed. No contact with the Valley Motel. Comply with any mental health regimen.

CASES 21CF257, 21CF443, 21CF550, 21CF253. 1:48 PM. JL-Clerk. Defendant Bridget Marie Zimmer appeared by video.  Atty Donna Burger appeared by video means, specially. Prosecuting attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp in court for the State of Wisconsin. CT quashes warrants. CT sets bond to cover all files. 1:57 pm adj.
Warrant returned by dispatch - Defendant in custody of Chisago County Jail

CASES 21CF257, 21CF443, 21CF550, 22CF253. 1:01 PM. JL-Clerk. Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Renee M Taber not in court. Def does not appear on stayed warrant from yesterday. State has no further information, req stay to be lifted. CT - granted, warrants will issue. 1:02 pm adj.

CASES 21CF257, 21CF443, 21CF550, 21TR611, 21TR612, 21TR613, 22CF253. 8:52 AM. JL-Clerk. Defendant Bridget Marie Zimmer not in court.  Attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Renee M Taber in court for Bridget Marie Zimmer. Def was provided Zoom information by counsel and does not appear on Zoom. State req warrant, geo to WI/MN on felony files. CT authorizes warrants but stays them until 8/2/22 at 1:00. CT takes costs of officer under advisement. State req default on TR files. CT finds Def in default on TR files. Def is ordered to pay the amount listed on citation, 60 dtp or set PP w/COC office. 8:56 am adj
Initial appearance on August 1, 2022 at 08:45 am.
